channel.title: Javascript on Le murmure de Julian
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Le murmure de Julian

item.title: [筆記][Vue.js] Slot的應用
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)
item.description:
Vue的component裡有一個還蠻好用的東西叫做Slot(文件在此), 尤其適用在開發複雜或巢狀的元件

那Slot是用在什麼樣的地方, 舉個例子, 假設我們有個元件叫做panel:

item.title: [筆記]利用axios-mock-adapter為axios提供測試用的假資料
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)
item.description: axios是蠻好用的javascript http client, 不僅可以在browser上跑, 也可以在node.js上用, 而且Promise形態的API寫起來就比較好看, 如果搭配async/await的寫法, 看起來就更加漂亮了

item.title: [筆記][Vue.js + Webpack] 判斷是否為開發環境
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)
item.description: 在開發的時候總會有一個需求是想在開發階段做跟生產環境不一樣的事, 像我自己的習慣是在做畫面時, 不見得後端資料和API都已經準備好了, 所以我會先以假的資料(mock data)來取代, 放上線後才是真正去抓server api

item.title: [ES6] Generators
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)
item.description: 這個語法蠻有趣的, 早上一直都在看這個想能拿來幹嘛? 結果早上有個phone interview就有點腦袋小小的轉不過來, 不過這不是重點, 先簡單的來講一下Generators

item.title: [筆記] Practice: Open graph with Facebook JavaScript API
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)
item.description:
Source: https://bitbucket.org/julianshen/videomag/overview

Demo URL: http://growing-wind-8625.herokuapp.com/top

Server: Play framework 2.0 on Heroku

Open graph object: Youtube video, Action: watch

It’s not a problem to add youtube video since it already contains open graph meta data in page. All we have to do is call “/me/video.watches?video=youtube_link” with POST.

To post activity to timeline, the permission “publish_actions” is required. 

The result on timeline:

item.title: [筆記] "Unsafe JavaScript attempt to access frame with URL" error with Facebook Javascript API
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)
item.description:
The following example shows how to create a simple Facebook login button with Facebook javascript API:

Normally, this page would be reloaded if user finished authorized your app. But it won’t be reloaded in Chrome due to the follwing error:

Unsafe JavaScript attempt to access frame with URL https://s-static.ak.fbcdn.net/connect/xd_proxy.php?version=3#cb=f363e58d9&origin=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ab.com%2Ffcb27588&relation=opener&transport=postmessage&frame=fac4c0f18&access_token=AAAEHZBpoK3B0BALv8Cf96gaKEnn4ZBtXgjCOQCFFhVDL4K0rZAE2NGDcqZCPlZByNNKEDmYSGKHQv8jAUM2yGZCHkOcyXUKhoZD&expires_in=0&signed_request=g7sYd_XQx-EBPtQQGk-0ISRMrUDnT4L4WHAmlNsVFBU. from frame with URL http://www.ab.com/login.html. Domains, protocols and ports must match.

Some people use FB.getLoginStatus() to check if user authorized app at page loaded. If page could be reloaded, it’s no problem. However, in this case, it’s not.

item.title: [筆記] Connect java client to a node.js server with Thrift
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)
item.description:
Thrift是由Facebook開發的一套RPC system, 廣泛的被很多軟體應用, 像是HBase, Hadoop, Cassandra… 也支援了許多語言 , 可以跨語言做RPC

但….Thrift的document真是么壽的少…少的實在有夠可憐….本來想說實作一個java client連到node.js寫的server, 搞半天東挖挖西挖挖後才搞定…..

item.title: [筆記][測試] Facebook Open graph + Heroku + node.js
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)
item.description: Open graph的確是個好物, 雖然說早在去年的f8就已經推出了, 但現在更加完備了, 其實也等不及看會有啥應用推出了, 當然自己也想來玩看看,  本想照Tutorial依樣畫葫蘆抄一個體驗看看, 又覺這樣太無聊, 又想說試看看heroku + node.js, 沒真的玩過node.js, 就拿這題目試試

item.title: [POC][筆記][Rhino on Android] - 新的onClickListener
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)
item.description:
上次的作法:

var button1 = findview(R.id(‘button1’));

button1.setOnClickListener(function(view, methodName)
{
     if (methodName == “onClick”) {
         log(“MyScript”, “clicked”);
} });

當然不是很滿意, “if(methodName == "onClick”)“這樣的寫法太醜了啦!

所以這次的目標是:

item.title: [筆記] building 64 bit v8 on Ubuntu
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)

item.title: [POC][筆記][Rhino] Developing Android with JS - onClickListener
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)
item.description:
上次做的僅止於setText這個簡單的動作, 那像是處理click這類的怎做?

先拿click來做範例, 在Android中, 如果要替一個view加上處理click動作要利用到View.setOnClickListener, 但setOnClickListener的參數是onClickListener, 這是一個java interface, 在Rhino中如何實作一個Java interface?

item.title: [POC] Using javascript to develop Android Activity
item.author: julianshen22@gmail.com (Julian Shen)
item.description:
好久沒玩些好玩的了….先來點小菜….(POC = Prove of concept, 只是剛好有些想法, 所以來證明一下可不可行)

基本的想法是想用類似下面的javascript來寫出Android Activity(當然, 要延伸成其他的應該也沒問題)
